name: Z-Termination
description:
Play as skull a special soldier sent to eliminate zeds and save civilians.

controls:

- arrows to move.

- up to jump

- down to dodge roll/jump through.

-x to use.

-hold x to shoot (gun needed).

- c to sword attack(unlock).

- x to rocket fly against boss (unlock).

music: Blast by Buskerdroid .
